Class DefaultAlertPolicy

  com.google.gxp.compiler.alerts.DefaultAlertPolicy
All Implemented Interfaces:
AlertPolicy, Serializable
public class DefaultAlertPolicy
extends Object
implements AlertPolicy

AlertPolicy which simply returns the Alert's default severity.

Method Detail

getSeverity

public Alert.Severity getSeverity(Alert alert)
Description copied from interface: AlertPolicy
Returns the severity of the specified Alert. Should not return null. It is recommended that implementors return the Alert's default severity if they have nothing better to say.

Specified by:
getSeverity in interface AlertPolicy
